title: Spinach Ricotta Gnocchi
ingredients: ['350g ricotta cheese', '120g spinach, blanched and chopped', '80g finely grated Parmesan cheese', '1 egg, lightly beaten', 'salt and pepper to taste', '65g plain flour', '60g unsalted butter', '1 large handful walnuts, roughly chopped', '15 fresh sage leaves', '1/2 lemon, juiced']
